section.p: If you have the codeword Ebony, . If not, read on.
A handsome man, wearing a gold turban and silken robes, floats down out of the sky on a flying carpet to land beside you.

'The name's Prince Azim. Look after this for me, would you?' he says matter-of-factly. He hands you a large sack. Then he takes off, and disappears into the distance. You notice several black specks in the sky that appear to be pursuing him.
Looking inside the sack, you find ! Note them on your Adventure Sheet.
